label: 吾妻
対訳語: A name for the Bandō or Eastern Provinces (Tōgoku)
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: More particularly the region lying east of the Ashigara-no-seki in Sagami-no-kuni and Usui-tōge in Kōzuke-no-kuni, which is to say, the great Kantō plain and the adjacent territories. [板東、東国、足柄関、相模国、碓氷峠、上野国]
